mapper.select:
SELECT cash.adjust_amt , cash.bank_card_no , cash.card_amt , cash.card_amt_bw , cash.card_cert_no , cash.card_num , cash.carrying_cash_amt , cash.cash_amt , cash.daily_flg , cash.deposit_amt , cash.depositor , cash.desc_txt , cash.init_amt , cash.job_type , cash.opt_date , cash.opt_date_m , cash.opt_date_show , cash.opt_date_y , cash.org_id , cash.retained_amt , cash.sale_amt , cash.sale_cash_amt , cash.report_amt , cash.coupon_value , cash.coupon_cash_value , cash.pre_pay_card_amt , cash.pre_pay_cash_amt , cash.gold_card_amt , cash.rebate_amt , user.name AS user_name, org.org_name AS org_name FROM t_cash_run cash LEFT JOIN t_organization org ON cash.org_id = org.org_id LEFT JOIN t_user USER ON user.uuid = cash.create_user_id
ORDER BY cash.org_id , cash.opt_date
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_cash_run WHERE opt_date > #{optDate} AND org_id = #{orgId}
mapper.select:

ORDER BY cash.opt_date , cash.org_id
